author: Pamela Muse
text:
I am looking for some municipal best practices related to close out reporting on Capital Projects.  We are looking for any templates that other municipalities may use to report out at the completion of those projects which might include things like:
Budget versus actual cots
Scheduled time versus completion time
Any challenges
Lessons learned.
Thank you,
Pam
